case.title: Blessed Lad..19...new to London..seeks gf! - 19 (Ldn Bridge)
case.text:
Good looking, British, white, happy, carefree, well-mannered young lad seeks new gf!! I have a car, & just moved into a new flat near London Bridge on my own so feeling lonely!!
Seeking a happy good-looking girl to have coffee, see films, & who knows.
Drop me a line & we'll take it from there!!
Mick
PS If you are wondering, I am 'blessed' in the trouser department lol (just so you know, because its not every girls cup-o-tea!!0
